item.title: ubuntu ctp 中文问题
item.author: william
item.description: 1 2 terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error' what(): locale::facet::_S_create_c_locale name not valid 需要安装中文包支持，因为 CTP 采用了中文接口 1 2 3 4 5 # Set the locale RUN apt-get clean && \ apt-get update && \ apt-get install -y locales locales-all && \ locale-gen zh_CN.GB18030
